definition: to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~
to touch/to make contact with sth/to stir up sb's emotions

sentences.chinese: 卫明有不同的感触感染。

sentences.english: I feel the delicate symmetry of a leaf.
sentences.chinese: 我感触到一片树叶的完美的对称性。

sentences.english: I have strong feelings about the balance of youth and experience in football.
sentences.chinese: 我对球队在年轻和经验之间的平衡深有感触。

sentences.english: My dear friends, you are my last friends!
sentences.chinese: 终于，看完了《最后的朋友》，感触良多。

sentences.english: The doctor's words madvertisinge him feel comfortable.
sentences.chinese: 医生的话让他感触很惬心。

sentences.english: I've noticed that you're a great believer in vacations. What place has inspired you most? —Anastasia Nikolaeva, Cologne, Germany.
sentences.chinese: 我注意到您都乐于去度假。哪个地方给您的感触最深？

sentences.english: And I learned two big lessons that have stuck with me.
sentences.chinese: 我学会了两件让我深有感触的教益。

sentences.english: Yeah, so, first of all, it was interesting, you throwback to HP.
sentences.chinese: 你回首了惠普的往事，让我深有感触。

sentences.english: There was a heightened awareness of each sunny day, the beautiful of flowers, the song of the bird.
sentences.chinese: 对每一个晴天丽日，对鸟语花香，我的感触倍加强烈。

sentences.english: There was a heightened awareness of each sunny day, the beauty of flowers, the song of bird.
sentences.chinese: 对每一个晴天丽日，对鸟语花香，我的感触倍加强烈。

sentences.english: That's no probelm. It is made of cotton, so you won't feel hot.
sentences.chinese: 没干系的，它是棉制的，你不会感触热的。

sentences.english: Don't be so wishy-washy. Tell us how you really feel.
sentences.chinese: 别这么含含混糊的，告诉我们你的实在感触吧。

sentences.english: This article makes me a myriad of, make me understand a lot.
sentences.chinese: 这篇文章使我感触良多，使我明白了很多道理。

sentences.english: What was it that always made me feel that way?
sentences.chinese: 是什么让我们有此感触？

sentences.english: CCTV to see night life, art shows, a lot of thoughts and feelings.
sentences.chinese: 那晚看央视艺术人生节目，感触颇多。

sentences.english: At the dock I' m shocked to see the pocket rocket made of a block of rock.
sentences.chinese: 在船埠看到一块岩石做的小巧火箭，我感触震惊。

definition: to touch/to stir up (trouble or emotions)/to move (sb's emotions or worry)
to know from experience/to learn through experience/to realize/understanding/experience
to feel as if it had happened to oneself/to sympathize/(polite expression of gratitude for a favor received by a friend etc) I take it as a personal favor
to sigh with sorrow, regret etc/rueful/deeply moved
to sense/perception/to feel (through the senses)/to experience/a feeling/an impression/an experience
what one has learned (through experience, reading etc)/knowledge/insight/understanding/tips/CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]
